actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to increase maximum mortgage amounts.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to increase the maximum mortgage amounts under the Federal Housing Administration's multifamily mortgage insurance programs including the homeownership program. Changes the eligibility requirements for mortgage insurance under the National Housing Act by decreasing downpayment requirements. Amends the Housing Act of 1959 to remove the power of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to issue obligations for purposes of offering loans for housing for elderly or handicapped families.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Housing Act to increase maximum mortgage amounts.
